pr_title: Use testcontainers for kudu unit tests

timeline.bodyText: Nit: add trailing comma (keeps diffs clean when adding new lines)
timeline.author: electrum
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -114,6 +96,7 @@ jobs:
           "presto-redis",
           "presto-sqlserver,presto-postgresql,presto-mysql",
           "presto-phoenix,presto-iceberg",
+          "presto-kudu"

timeline.message: Use testcontainers for kudu unit tests

timeline.bodyText: Move this above, to be directly after createQueryRunner
timeline.author: electrum

timeline.bodyText: This isn't needed as AbstractTestQueryFramework will close the returned query runner
timeline.author: electrum

timeline.bodyText: Let's move this method above and fix it by removing the redundant query runner close and the drop table. (no point in dropping since this is a temporary server we are about to destroy)
timeline.author: electrum
kokosing
kokosing

timeline.bodyText: I would prefer to have two DockerContainer instances here instead of using docker-compose. See: io.prestosql.tests.product.launcher.env.common.Standard
timeline.author: kokosing
kokosing
kokosing

timeline.bodyText: It looks like we are now losing some tests coverage. Not sure how much important is this. I wonder if it is possible to have some smoke tests to be executed 3 times for these cases, like having base smoke tests class for kudu and three different implementation with three different KuduServer. That requires that KuduServer need to be parametric.
timeline.author: kokosing
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -52,24 +52,6 @@ jobs:
             ./mvnw test -B -Dair.check.skip-all -pl presto-hive -P test-hive-glue
           fi
 
-  kudu-tests:
-    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
-    steps:
-      - uses: actions/checkout@v1
-      - uses: actions/setup-java@v1
-        with:
-          java-version: 8
-      - name: Install Kudu Module
-        run: |
-          export MAVEN_OPTS="${MAVEN_INSTALL_OPTS}"
-          ./bin/retry ./mvnw install ${MAVEN_FAST_INSTALL} -am -pl presto-kudu
-      - name: Run Kudu Tests -- disable InferSchema
-        run: presto-kudu/bin/run_kudu_tests.sh "null"
-      - name: Run Kudu Tests -- enable InferSchema, empty prefix
-        run: presto-kudu/bin/run_kudu_tests.sh ""
-      - name: Run Kudu Tests -- enable InferSchema, standard prefix
-        run: presto-kudu/bin/run_kudu_tests.sh "presto::"

timeline.author: kokosing

timeline.bodyText: Use Closer, so in case any container fail to stop, the other one is stopped.
timeline.author: kokosing

timeline.bodyText: maybe use always 2, no need to pass parameter then.
timeline.author: kokosing

replies.bodyText: We can't set an even number of replication
replies.author: Praveen2112

timeline.author: kokosing
kokosing

timeline.bodyText: No need to wrap this line
timeline.author: kokosing
kokosing
kokosing
